con:part.con:content: <application xmlns="http://wadl.dev.java.net/2009/02" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <grammars/> <resources base="http://10.246.89.108:20891/pbdsrv/api/v7"> <resource path="/straks/financial-institutions"> <method name="GET"> <request> <param name="effective-date" style="query"/> <param name="iso-flag" style="query" type="xs:boolean"/> <param name="business-day-check" style="query" default="false" type="xs:boolean"/> <param name="member-id" style="query" type="xs:string"/> <param name="page-token" style="query" default="1" type="xs:int"/> <param name="page-size" style="query" default="500" type="xs:int"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="/"> <resource path="channels"> <method name="GET"> <request> <param name="bank-code" style="query" type="xs:string"/> <param name="include-old-org-id" style="query" default="true" type="xs:boolean"/> <param name="language" style="query" type="xs:string"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="product-hierarchies"> <method name="GET"> <request> <param name="area-name" style="query" type="xs:string"/> <param name="group-name" style="query" type="xs:string"/> <param name="family-name" style="query" type="xs:string"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="products"> <method name="GET"> <request> <param name="view" style="query" default="BASIC" type="xs:string"/> <param name="area-name" style="query" type="xs:string"/> <param name="group-name" style="query" type="xs:string"/> <param name="family-name" style="query" type="xs:string"/> <param name="product-name" style="query" type="xs:string"/> <param name="base-product-name" style="query" type="xs:string"/> <param name="currency-code" style="query" type="xs:string"/> <param name="status" style="query" repeating="true" type="xs:string"/> <param name="start-date" style="query"/> <param name="order-by" style="query" default="START_DATE" type="xs:string"/> <param name="order-in" style="query" default="asc" type="xs:string"/> <param name="page-token" style="query" default="1" type="xs:int"/> <param name="page-size" style="query" default="500" type="xs:int"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> <method name="POST"> <request> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> <method name="PUT"> <request> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="products/-/base-products"> <method name="GET"> <request> <param name="family-name" style="query" type="xs:string"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="products/{product-id}"> <param name="product-id" style="template" type="xs:long"/> <method name="DELETE"> <request/> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> <method name="GET"> <request/> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="products/{ref-key}/{ref-value}:reference-read"> <param name="ref-key" style="template" type="xs:string"/> <param name="ref-value" style="template" type="xs:string"/> <method name="GET"> <request> <param name="status" style="query" repeating="true" type="xs:string"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> </resource> <resource path="/currencies"> <method name="GET"> <request> <param name="page-token" style="query" default="1" type="xs:int"/> <param name="page-size" style="query" default="500" type="xs:int"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> <resource path="/-/bank-currencies"> <method name="GET"> <request> <param name="currency-code" style="query" type="xs:string"/> <param name="currency-name" style="query" type="xs:string"/> <param name="display-online-rate" style="query" type="xs:boolean"/> <param name="display-cash-rate" style="query" type="xs:boolean"/> <param name="is-suspended" style="query" type="xs:boolean"/> <param name="is-payment-currency" style="query" type="xs:boolean"/> <param name="info-only-rate" style="query" type="xs:boolean"/> <param name="status" style="query" repeating="true" type="xs:string"/> <param name="page-token" style="query" default="1" type="xs:int"/> <param name="page-size" style="query" default="500" type="xs:int"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> <method name="POST"> <request> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> <method name="PUT"> <request> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="/-/bank-currencies/-/valid-currencies"> <method name="GET"> <request> <param name="include-suspended" style="query" default="false" type="xs:boolean"/> <param name="page-token" style="query" default="1" type="xs:int"/> <param name="page-size" style="query" default="500" type="xs:int"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="/-/bank-currencies/{change-id}"> <param name="change-id" style="template" type="xs:long"/> <method name="DELETE"> <request/> <response> name="bank-code" style="query" type="xs:string"/> <param name="old-bank-code" style="query" type="xs:string"/> <param name="bank-identification-code" style="query" type="xs:string"/> <param
